title: yasuo skin:P
body: sooo i was thinking the other day about a skin design then i reliased that you could make a atlantic yasuo skin which would be great i cant draw or anything but i can explain what it would be like first his normal q would be just like a gush of water  going at them then his tornado would be a whirlpool his w would be a wave and his emote would be face the wave instead of face the wind i know creative right haha but then his e would leave a trail of water behind hin in the shape of his body and his ult when they get knocked back down it would like push water back up im not sure about his actual body design yet but i need some help from people that can actually design skins and could tell me how far we can go wiht it but i though about his blade and i hope its can be made out of water and have some motion in it like ahri's magic ball

replies.body:
Thats a pretty cool idea!

I like the water abilities you have listed. They sound really awesome. The next steps would be for you to really nail the champion model! 

What would you do with his MAIN iconic features? For me that is his shoulder armour, his hair and his sword. Really think about what you would do to those elements to make them suit the Atlantic theme but also stay recognizable as those original iconic pieces.

For example if you look at **Talon**. All of his skins have his signature blade, and the bladeish cape. They manage to capture Talons silhouette  and make him recognizable in each skin while also making him different and fresh.

His blades and shoulder armor could be made of ice crystals (maybe coral) and his hair can be blue watery tentacles, similar to atlantean syndra, that or a cluster of jellyfish tentacles.
